snippet.title: QuitToday_Game Trailer_EN📢
snippet.description:
🔺Steam page
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1858450/QUIT_TODAY/
-
In daily life, when you step into the company, all the colleagues attack you for preventing your resignation!
To figure out what happened, you start a fighting trip with your suitcase, and realize the company darkness which you ever ignored is so hateful. You can't keep enduring the high-level's behavior, and decide to send the resignation challenge to this company formally!

#QuitToday
#YOHCAN
#IndieGame
